definition: few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 4)/see 撇[pie3]
how much?/how many?/(phone number, student ID etc) what number?
how much?/how many?/(phone number, student ID etc) what number?
rare/not familiar (to the speaker)/sth rarely experience/hard to see

sentences.english: However, traveling in groups means less freedom.
sentences.chinese: 然而，组团旅行较少自由。

sentences.english: He beat the time of Warcraft are less and less time to Kazakhstan.
sentences.chinese: 他打魔兽的时间都少，没有那么多的时间哈。

sentences.english: China was second with 32, four behind the United States.
sentences.chinese: 中国有32枚，比美国少4枚，排在第二位。

sentences.english: Eat fat food less, no-noSmokeWine, answer to often maintain defecate unobstructed .
sentences.chinese: 少吃油腻食物，禁忌烟酒，并应经常保持大便通畅。

sentences.english: I have a coupon for five dollars off a steak dinner.
sentences.chinese: 我有一张点牛排可以少五元的折价券。

sentences.english: Anexpensive brassiere will cost less than an expensive handbag.
sentences.chinese: 一款高档胸罩比一个高档手袋花费的要少得多。

sentences.english: But the amounts they have put on the table have been small.
sentences.chinese: 但是在桌面上提出来的价格是这么少。

sentences.english: Buy vehicles with low NOX emissions, and maintain all vehicles well.
sentences.chinese: 购买少产生氮氧化物的汽车，保持汽车的良好状态。

sentences.english: But if less is more, how you keepin' score?
sentences.chinese: 但如果少就是多，成就该如何算？

sentences.english: When the being killed is immoral, then you get less bad results.
sentences.chinese: 如果被杀者是无德的，那么你得的恶报少一些。

sentences.english: Past mid-life, one learns little and expects little.
sentences.chinese: 一过中年，学习得少，期望也少。

sentences.english: If you want the job, you must be prepared to take a drop in salary.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想干这份工作就必须愿意少拿薪水。

sentences.english: Drink fewer sodas and other sweetened drinks, like iced tea.
sentences.chinese: 少喝苏打汽水和其他甜饮料，比如冰茶。

sentences.english: The general anesthesia therapy dose are few, regains consciousness thoroughly, rapid, the controllability is good.
sentences.chinese: 全麻药用量少，苏醒彻底，迅速，可控性好。

sentences.english: The domestic report botulism causes to breathe the myoparalysis case of illness to be less.
sentences.chinese: 国内报道肉毒中毒导致呼吸肌麻痹的病例较少。

sentences.english: The more LRP5, the more the enzyme is blocked, and the less serotonin is made.
sentences.chinese: LRP5越多，越多的酶被阻滞，复合胺产生越少。

definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
some/a few/a little/(following an adjective) slightly ...er
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
